name: Krista Fincke
text: Always above and beyond to help their customers! Also very knowledgeable.

name: John Seagroves
text: I’ve taken my van to Gulf State since I bout my 2007 Dodge Grand Caravan from them. There’s no one I trust more to work on my van to continue to keep me safe on the road. There first priority is to the customer and making sure there Knowledged before leaving there facility. There work is top notch and have never taken advantage of myself. Shout out to James. He’s always been there for me when I needed to ask a question over the phone. Always been there for me when I was on a jam.

name: Detrect Skinner JR
text: Excellent service and very professional facilities.

name: Ken Gamble
text:
I bought a van from them, years ago, that they redid all the work that another company did to it as far as the lift system goes.
I took it back to them a little while back because the lift was coming out before the doors would open and it shattered my side window one time. They checked it out, did a couple of things and said, okay you're good to go, charged over $400. I got home, it started doing the same thing again. Couple days later I went back up there again, they looked over it, charged over $400 again and said there's nothing we can do with it, even though they redid the lift system and now it's worse than it was before. I don't have money to drive hours away for nothing, they should have told me when we talked the 2nd time they could not do it.

name: Bob Broach
text:
Really great staff i.e office and technicians. Had to reschedule due to medical problems. Staff worked no went out of their way to help me get my lift operating again.
Great improvements  to waiting room and restrooms. Really like the addition of all the Military Flags on the wall of the showroom.

name: Jhonny Kelly
text: Gulf State mobility is a very professiona . And very curious employees and very respectable and also , they employees was helpful and they also explained everything clearly so I can understand about the lifter , they install on truck I will prefer anyone to gulf State mobility for service and quality

name: willie johnson jr
text: Have gotten excellent service and professional expertise from staff. I was referred by  the V  for my mobility needs and am more then satisfied with my product and follow up repairs and service. Thanks for everything!!!

name: Todd Daigle
text: I purchased a vehicle from this place and I've been treated very good since. James(the owner) is very personable and will go above and beyond most place would be willing to help you out. The only thing that's bad about the place is it's and hour and a half from my house, but worth the drive each time I had to go.

name: Thomas Garrett
text: Hands down this is the best place to go if you need something worked on such as wheelchair accessibility list for your vehicle's doors anything you can imagine these guys can do if it has to do with handicap and military because the owner James Garrett is a retired military

name: Bob B.
text: Gulf States Mobility are the best in the business. Excellent work and a great staff.

name: Clint
text: Friendly and courteous staff. All prices upfront,  no hidden costs.

name: Dennis Tomlin
text: Great group of folks. They built 2 of my accessible vans and maintained a third.I have been going there for 17 years. Ask for Tommy!

name: Jobelle Collie
text: i hope you have an entire day to waste.  slow service and poor customer service.

name: Ben Tipton
text: Good company does quality work

name: Mandi Cooper
text: Great Customer service

name: Chris Anderson
text: very friendly, very professional

name: bama fan
text: Staff always friendly.

name: Alphon James
text: Good Job!

name: Grandville Anderson
text: Nice

name: Ronald Otis Lee
text:
My wife and I went to MobilityWorks a few weeks ago to find this well taken care of by it's first and only owner that traded it in but my point is this used van had been well maintained and this dealership made us this wonderful offer that we couldn't refuse.

We're well pleased by the way Chris and Allen had the few repairs taken care of. They were wonderful.

All we can tell anybody looking and needing a really good used or new handicap van go by and talk with 2 nice guys Chris and Allen. We'll sure you'll be as pleased with your sale and any repairs needed there.

resp.text: Ronald, we take customer satisfaction very seriously. We’d like to get in contact with you personally to get more details about your review. Please provide your contact info at https://www.mobilityworks.com/review/ so that our Regional Manager can reach out. Thank you.

name: Stuart Herring
text: As always, we had good quick service for our van. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Recommended!

name: Ann Wright
text: Thank you Willy, Chris and Sandy for taking care of all our needs and helping us find the right van for us! Our family is a long time customer of Mobility Works, Bessemer and have come to feel like family! They go above and beyond in all situations!!!

name: Herbert Smith
text: If you lease from here and your love one past away, in order to break the lease they want you to pay the lease out. Which don't make sense, because you will turn in the vehicle and pay the lease out so the can lease it out to someone else. Getting me some legal representation to handle this. This is how much they like disabled veterans., who lost a child.

resp.text: Herbert we are sorry for what you are going through. We've sent this review to our Regional Manager and he will be contacting you.

name: ALLEN WILLIAMS
text: I work at Mobility Works.  We help people in wheelchairs gain their independence

name: John Hollock
text: Chris Wathey and Willy Moulin both did an outstanding job of guiding us through the process of getting our Braunability van through the VA. We truly appreciate all the hard work and tenacity they showed while going through all the steps with VA. We love our new Pacifica van!

name: SFES PTA
text:
As a Special Needs parent, having a company that promises you reliability and great customer service is VERY important.
I feel as if I was taken advantage of. There has always been minor problems that should have been fixed and they never found time to fix things when I lived 4hrs away and was in the area. I call and email  to ask questions, and never get a response in time. I have asked repeatedly to get a quote on my van to sell back and they don’t even have the decency to call or email me back.
I would suggest BraunAbility, they seem to have better customer service from what I found out from other special needs families.

resp.text: We are very sorry to hear that you were unsatisfied with your recent visit to our Birmingham location. If you could please email us your contact information we will have our Regional Manager reach out to you. You can email us at ask@mobilityworks.com. Thank you.

name: James Casey
text: Incredibly helpful and knowledgeable place. If your in need of a handicap accessible vehicle this is the place to go.

name: William Moulin
text: Best place for handicap needs!

name: Amy Manley
text: A 2 hr. drive and was told that the van had to be details then was told can't get parts for a van that old.

resp.text: Amy customer satisfaction is something we take very seriously. We’d like to get in contact with you personally to get more details about this. Please provide your contact info at https://www.mobilityworks.com/review/  so that our Regional Manager can reach out. Thank you.

name: Annette Mooney
text: Have to take the van to be worked on, it's getting old wish we could afford a new one

name: Rita Jones
text: Always great service.

name: Joe jones
text: Best services for disability helps Center in North Alabama. We got our van little over a year ago. And they treated us like family and still do anytime we need them. Super fair prices also. I highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Gerrelyne Burnette
text: My family and I have had to experience some health challenges that we never imagined before 6/5/2019. I went into MobilityWorks to inquire about a rental to take my sister who has been mobility challenged since her stroke in 2019 to her party. Tiana Garner went above and beyond customer service. She shared helpful information on A gentleman that had a vehicle to donate that is fully equipped to accommodate transporting my sister. Tiana Garner is a professional that takes her career to heart. In business it’s not about just what you specialize in it is about helping where you can. And that is what she did. God used her to meet a need for a family that wants to make sure their  loved one does not miss her surprise birthday party. Thank you Tiana Garner.

name: Bea Godbee
text: Great sales person. Still waiting for the van we bought 4 days ago to be delivered. Hope it gets here the first part of this coming week! Can hardly wait for our wheelchair accessible van with ramp. Open roads, here we come! <3

name: NoneofYour Business
text: The Store Manager is a liar and a thief.  She encourages her employees to lie to customers and tell them they need things on their cars that they don't.  She never returns phones calls (or maybe she is never really there most of the time).  This location is much more interested in ways to get your money than it is taking care of its customers.  Find someone else that is honest and more customer service oriented than this place to take your equipment to!  I can't believe this place is still in business and that they haven't had sense enough to get rid of that awful fake-a$$ manager they have.

resp.text: NoneofYourBusiness, We take customer satisfaction very seriously. We’d like to get in contact with you personally to get more details about your experience with our Huntsville location. Please provide your contact info at https://www.mobilityworks.com/review/ so that our Regional Manager can reach out. Thank you.

name: Maxi Kaylin
text: The people were so nice.  They had to order a part so I knew it would take longer. But the wrong part was sent so they had to reorder. MobilityWorks called and apologized for the delay.  They seem to want to satisfy their customers.

name: Gilbert Jones
text: Being a two time "Vietnam Veteran and after a very major auto dealership in my local area blew me off on a purchase of a vehicle to accommodate  me and my handicap scooter, however, they did do something right when I was referred by their employee to "MOBILITY WORKS!" Scott came to my house in a vehicle which pleased me greatly and between him and Melissa, a way was made shortly thereafter to purchase this vehicle.  Thanks to my "God" first and foremost because He alone made it possible for Scott and Melissa to do what they did to accommodate my needs! PTL

name: Karen BlueBaird
text: Very knowledgeable and friendly business. Repaired my wheelchair van while I waited.

name: Josh LyBrand
text: Mobility Works helped us find exactly what we were looking for!  Scott Grabner is the absolute best and made sure everything was absolutely perfect!  Go see him!

name: Londi Foster
text: Scott Grabner was our salesman and this was the best experience we've had with any sales staff.   Very knowledgable and efficient. More importantly, not the aggressive pitch we have frequently experienced. Walked us through the entire process over several days. Melissa was equally proficient and helpfull with the extensive signoff paperwork. Highly recommend this firm.

name: James McComb
text: Great people to work with. They have always accommodated my needs for a van.

name: Cyndy Akin
text: This is a great company!

name: Ben Tipton
text: Great service

name: sandra whorton
text: Very nice people
